metadata.description: Deposition of Dr. Vello Norman, Vice President of Research and Development at Lorillard Tobacco Company, testifying in the People of the State of California, et al. v. Philip Morris Incorporated, et al. Dr. Vello Norman answers questions about methods to determine smoke yields during laboratory research and Lorillard analysis of newly release Premier cigarette manufactured by R.J. Reynolds. Tape #5.
metadata.subject: tobacco; cigarette;cigarette smoke; laboratory research; nicotine; tar; low yield cigarette; tobacco industry scientist; filter; cigarette ingredient; cigarette additive; testimony; legal activity; cigarette analysis;Browse by keywords in UCSF industry videos
